description: ChIP-Seq data for 13 macrophage sample(s). 55 run(s), 55 experiment(s), 55 alignment(s). Part of BLUEPRINT release January 2015. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20140811/homo_sapiens/README_chipseq_analysis_ebi_20140811
